content: From the edge of the cliff, look straight down to see a pool of water. Go down and to the center of this water to fight our first optional boss, Jiao-Loong of Waves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Secret Chest'.
The content is as follows:
From the edge of the cliff, look straight down to see a pool of water. Go down and to the center of this water to fight our first optional boss, Jiao-Loong of Waves.
